sections.heading: organization; discontinuance; when effective
sections.text: If a majority of the votes cast on the question are for the discontinuance of township organization, then such organization shall cease to exist effective at the expiration of the supervisors' terms of office in January of the third calendar year followin

23-295.Township organization; discontinuance; when effective.

If a majority of the votes cast on the question are for the discontinuance of township organization, then such organization shall cease to exist effective at the expiration of the supervisors' terms of office in January of the third calendar year following such election.

SourceLaws 1885, c. 43, § 4, p. 236;R.S.1913, § 1059;C.S.1922, § 961;C.S.1929, § 26-275;R.S.1943, § 23-295;Laws 2008, LB269, § 8;Laws 2009, LB434, § 3.
